response.original_title: Thomas and Friends - My First Thomas with the Fat Controller
response.overview: The "My First Thomas" series is designed to be an introduction for new fans who are just embarking on their journey into the wonderful world of Thomas & Friends. Each collection focuses on one key character from the series and allows the fledgling Thomas fan to get familiar with Thomas, the Island of Sodor and all the fun adventures the friends have every day. Episodes: Pop Goes the Diesel; Dirty Work; Diesel Does it Again; The Worlds Strongest Engine; Thomas to the Rescue; Bold and Brave; Flour Power and Emily and the Special Coaches.
response.title: Thomas and Friends - My First Thomas with the Fat Controller
